Texts.Eng:
These humanoid, sapient wasps are each their own hive, and are handy in the air.

Diet:  Meat, Sugars, Fruits

^orange;Perks^reset;:
From race mod: Flight, Multijump, Wallslide
+^green;15^reset;% Health
^green;-39^reset;Falling speed, increased jumping speed
+^green;8^reset;% Speed,
Immune: Insanity

Poor Liquid Traversal

Dagger: +^green;25^reset;% damage
